text:
This is so important in #LosAngeles too. I volunteered at The Forum last week- to get a #COVID19 #vaccine, folks needed to: 1) know eligibility 2) make appt online or by phone (some reported hrs on hold) & 3) have access to a car (drive-thru only)

Distance is just *one* barrier. https://t.co/sk4xQ9BOHN
